content: ## **hello ** ## this is a pattern for a mini mushroom doll which is 4 inches /10cm tall and 3 inches / 8cm wide i used a 3 5 mm hook to work on this but you can do it with whatever hook you have at hand materials * red yarn * white yarn * black yarn for the mouth * 2 8mm safety eyes * any kind of stuffing you prefer * embroidery needle or any kind of thick needle which could help you sew/embroider on the mouth and spots on the cap you can t share sell or claim this pattern as yours but you can obviously sell the dolls you make with it and make your own pattern with this as a base credit when making the doll is appreciated
